data.actual_result: Only the cursor changes, and no error appears. This is confusing to the user.
data.expected_result: The error "Disabled for @ everyone" should appear
data.short_description: When hovering over the toggle switch for a permission option, disabled role settings don't show their error. Hovering over descriptions works fine
data.steps_to_repro: - Go to Server Settings -> Roles - Select @ everyone - Hover your cursor over THE ON/OFF TOGGLE SWITCH (not the description) for "Allow anyone to mention this role"
